DOC.brief_title: Geriatric Out Hospital Randomized Meal Trial Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: This two center , randomize , single-blind , attention control trial 12 week total duration design determine safety efficacy home-delivered sodium-restricted Dietary Approaches Stop Hypertension ( DASH/SRD ) -compliant meal old adult ( age > = 65 year ) follow discharge hospital admission acutely decompensated heart failure . 60 subject randomize 1:1 stratified fashion gender leave ventricular ejection fraction ( < vs. ≥ 50 % ) . Study subject receive either pre-prepared , home-delivered DASH/SRD-compliant meal attention control 4 week hospital discharge . The two study site Columbia University Medical Center University Michigan Health System . Investigators blind group assignment , food diary , urinary electrolyte measurement completion study
DOC.criteria: 60 male female patient age ≥ 65 year history systemic hypertension acutely decompensated heart failure ( ADHF ; primary diagnosis admission secondary diagnosis hospitalization another reason ) . ADHF confirm study physician define combination symptom , sign , HFspecific medical treatment .
